name: Jeanie_Pombelek
text:
Jeanie Pombelek
"She does not speak one word of English."
 ―Pete Martell
Jeanie Pombelek was a counter at the Clean and Save dry cleaning service.
She moved from Budapest to Twin Peaks and got a job at a dry cleaning service, despite her lack of knowledge of English.
One day Pete Martell came to her, but since he knew only two words in Hungarian, they just stood there and "looked at each other like were made of wood."
